titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to J. H. Graham
CWG13798

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1865 Telegraphing, State Guards, Printing, Hospital, Office Expenses, Services Rendered; Left Stack

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To J. H. Graham Opr Dr

row.cell: For Services rendered, For September 1865 Telegraph Opr

body.p: I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service. and will be reported on my return of for the month end-ing the day of 1865.
Captain and Assistant Quarter-Master Ky. Vols.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 3d of Octo, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of Thirty Dollars, and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No 4 Abstract B"4" Qr. 186.
J. H. Graham
Dollars 30 xx/100
Paid 3d Octo, 1865.
Telegraphing
548
